entry.title: EPiCS article on "Self-Awareness in Computing Systems" in Awareness Magazine
entry.content: Peter Lewis, Xin Yao and Marco Platzner have contributed an article named An outlook for self-awareness in computing systems to the Awareness Magazine.

entry.title: EPiCS presentations at FPL'11
entry.content:
The EPiCS consortium will be well represented at the International Conference for Field Programmable Logic and Applications (FPL'11), which will be held from September 5-7 in Chania, Crete. The following papers will be presented as talks or in poster sessions:

  • A. Agne, M. Platzner, and E. Lübbers. Memory virtualization for multithreaded reconfigurable hardware. In Proc. Int. Conf. on Field Programmable Logic and Applications (FPL), Sept. 2011. To appear.
  • T. Becker, Q. Liu, W. Luk, G. Nebehay, and R. Pflugfelder. Hardware-accelerated object tracking. In Proc. Int. Conf. on Field Programmable Logic and Applications (FPL), Sept. 2011. To appear.
  • M. Happe and E. Lübbers. A hybrid multi-core architecture for real-time video tracking. In Proc. Int. Conf. on Field Programmable Logic and Applications (FPL), Sept. 2011. To appear.
  • Q. Jin, W. Luk, and D. Thomas. Unifying option-pricing designs for hardware acceleration. In Proc. Int. Conf. on Field Programmable Logic and Applications (FPL), Sept. 2011. To appear.
  • X. Y. Niu, K. H. Tsoi, and W. Luk. Reconfiguring distributed applications in FPGA accelerated cluster with wireless networking. In Proc. Int. Conf. on Field Programmable Logic and Applications (FPL), Sept. 2011. To appear.

If you are attending FPL, we invite you to seize the opportunity to discuss with the presenters about the EPiCS project.

entry.title: Another major update to the publication list
entry.content:
We have added the following publications to the EPiCS publication list:

  • G. Chow, K. Kwok, W. Luk, and P. Leong. Mixed precision comparison in reconfigurable systems. In Proc. IEEE Symp. on Field-Programmable Custom Computing Machines (FCCM), pages 17–24. IEEE, May 2011.
  • S. Denholm, K. H. Tsoi, P. Pietzuch, and W. Luk. CusComNet: a customisable network for reconfigurable heterogeneous clusters. In Proc. IEEE Int. Conf. on Application-Specific Systems, Architectures, and Processors (ASAP), Sept. 2011. To appear.
  • Q. Jin, W. Luk, and D. Thomas. Unifying option-pricing designs for hardware acceleration. In Proc. Int. Conf. on Field Programmable Logic and Applications (FPL), Sept. 2011. To appear.
  • Q. Jin, W. Luk, and D. B. Thomas. On comparing financial option price solvers on FPGA. In Proc. IEEE Symp. on Field-Programmable Custom Computing Machines (FCCM), pages 89–92. IEEE, Apr. 2011.
  • A. Keller, D. Borkmann, and W. Mühlbauer. Efficient implementation of dynamic protocol stacks. In Proc. ACM/IEEE Symp. on Architecture for Networking and Communications Systems (ANCS). IEEE, Oct. 2011. To appear.

For details please refer to our publications list
